text: Edward Michael Abroms (May 6, 1935 â€“ February 13, 2018) was an American movie and television editor. He was nominated at the 56th Academy Awards for his work on the movie Blue Thunder. He also received a Primetime Emmy Award for editing the Columbo NBC Mystery Movie in 1972.Emmys.com He also directed for the 1978-1979 NBC television series The Eddie Capra Mysteries. He was born in Los Angeles, California.
